name: Facebook
description:
Mod Facebook++ : 

 Download videos to your device 
 Copy videos to clipboard to paste or send later, or save/download to albums

 View most recent photos instead of popular ones

 Protect the Facebook app with Touch ID or passcode

 Hide tabs

 Disable video auto-play

 Full-screen mode

 Re-enables the old sidebar navigation

 and much more!

name: Instagram
description:
Mod Instagram++ : 

 Instagram++ is one of the most useful tweaks that adds new features to the Instagram app. With Instagram Plus Plus, you can do the following:


 Save photos and videos to your device

 Switch between grid view or the default list view

 Hide comments in your timeline

 Open links inside Instagram

 Show caption while zooming an image

 Share videos/photos with third-party apps

 Re-gram photos and videos

 View the full timestamp for posts (date and time)

name: Snapchat
description:
Mod Snapchat++ : 

 Save your Snaps

 Disable Live Stories

 Disable the video editor

 Use energy saving mode

 Disable Discovery Stories

name: Youtube
description:
Mod Youtube++ : 

 YouTube++ (or YouTube Plus Plus) is an amazing tweak that adds new features to YouTube, such as:


 Download videos to your device

 Block Ads

 Play video/audio in the background

 Set video playback speed (0.5x - 2.0x)

 Auto-replay videos

 Disable age restrictions

 Forward/Rewind controls with custom number of seconds

 Default playback quality

 Audio player for downloaded videos

 Convert video or audio

 Much more!

name: Whatsapp
description:
MOD WhatsApp Watusi : 

 brings a bunch of useful new features to WhatsApp such as:


 Disable read receipts

 Freeze your last seen status

 Disable delivery and typing indicators

 Select unlimited number of photos to send

 Password-protect the app

 Call recorder

 Lock chats

 Enables send button while offline

 Customization of the app's user interface
